title: Escape (Part 3)
body:
Escape (Part 3)

"We should be able to catch them in about one hour," Arden said as he placed a storage ring inside a small metal device. The metal device was square in shape, and there was a small opening at the side where Arden placed the storage ring.

The top side of the device looked like a compass, and the moment Arden placed the storage ring inside it, the needle at the top started to point in a certain direction.

"Thanks for your help Master Arden..." Lucian said with a stiff smile on his face and nodded his head.

'This bastard is definitely taking advantage of my situation,' Lucian said inwardly and felt like crying.

The device Arden was using could track the airship that Cedar had bought earlier, but in order to track the airship, the device needed a large amount of energy.
